languages.text: "Хоть мы и в Комморре, но это не повод приветствовать Вольного Торговца не на коленях".
"We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."
languages.original_text: "Хоть мы и в Комморре, но это не повод приветствовать Вольного Торговца не на коленях".

traits.locale_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but that is no reason to hail a Rogue Trader without getting on your knees."
"We may be in Commorragh, but that is no reason to hail a Rogue Trader without getting on your knees."
"We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."
"We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."
"We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

languages.text: “尽管我们身处科摩罗，但我依然是行商浪人，你要以与我的地位相称的方式来向我行礼。跪下吧。”
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我们身处科摩罗，但我依然是行商浪人，你要以与我的地位相称的方式来向我行礼。跪下吧。”

languages.text: 「コモラフにいようと、私の自由開拓者としての地位は変わらない。跪き、相応の挨拶をせよ」
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフにいようと、私の自由開拓者としての地位は変わらない。跪き、相応の挨拶をせよ」

languages.text: «Por más que estemos en Commorragh, sigo siendo un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y debe tratarme como exige mi rango. De rodillas».
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: «Por más que estemos en Commorragh, sigo siendo un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y debe tratarme como exige mi rango. De rodillas».

languages.text: « Nous sommes peut-être à Commorragh, mais je reste {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et j'attends de vous que vous me présentiez vos respects comme il se doit. À genoux. »
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes peut-être à Commorragh, mais je reste {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et j'attends de vous que vous me présentiez vos respects comme il se doit. À genoux. »

languages.text: "Wir mögen in Commorragh sein, aber ich bin immer noch {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}, und Ihr werdet mich grüßen, wie es meinem Rang geziemt. Auf die Knie!"
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: "Wir mögen in Commorragh sein, aber ich bin immer noch {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}, und Ihr werdet mich grüßen, wie es meinem Rang geziemt. Auf die Knie!"

languages.text: "Commorragh'ta olabiliriz ama ben hâlâ Hür Tacir'im. Beni layık olduğum şekilde selamlayacaksın. Diz çök."
languages.original_text: "We may be in Commorragh, but I am still a Rogue Trader, and you will greet me as befits my rank. On your knees."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ta olabiliriz ama ben hâlâ bir Hür Tacir'im. Beni layık olduğum şekilde selamlayacaksın. Diz çök."
